message.content: {"id": "42225", "title": "Unable to assign command to Ctrl+Backspace", "description": "I am unable to assign a command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination. When I try to do so via the key preference page, it displays Ctrl+Del instead of Ctrl+Backspace. I am using a Swiss German Keyboard with Swiss German Locale.", "OB": "The keybinding manager incorrectly identifies Ctrl+Backspace as Ctrl+Del and performs the delete next word action instead. This prevents the user from assigning any command to Ctrl+Backspace.", "EB": "The keybinding manager should correctly identify and display Ctrl+Backspace when the user tries to assign a command to it. Additionally, the assigned command should work as expected when the Ctrl+Backspace combination is triggered.", "SR": "The keybinding manager needs to be updated to properly recognize Ctrl+Backspace and allow the user to assign commands to it. The key preferences page should also display Ctrl+Backspace instead of Ctrl+Del when the user tries to assign a command."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '42225', 'title': "Bug 42225Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace", 'description': "Bug 42225Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace ", 'OB': 'Somehow the keybinding manager thinks this is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.If I try to reassing the key via key pref page it displays Ctrl+Del when I pressCtrl+Backspace.I have a Swiss German Keyboard using Swiss German Locale. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Somehow the keybinding manager thinks this is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.If I try to reassing the key via key pref page it displays Ctrl+Del when I pressCtrl+Backspace.I have a Swiss German Keyboard using Swiss German Locale. '}
